data.lyric:
[ti:The Good Ones]
[ar:Gabby Barrett]
[al:The Good Ones]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Good Ones - Gabby Barrett
[00:05.07]Lyrics by：Gabby Barrett/Emily Landis/Jim McCormick/Zachary Kale
[00:10.15]He's a phone call to his parents
[00:12.82]He's a bible by the bed
[00:15.51]He's the T shirt that I'm wearing
[00:18.17]He's the song stuck in my head
[00:20.82]He's solid and he's steady
[00:23.44]Like the Allegheny runs
[00:26.52]He knows just where he's going
[00:28.81]And he's proud of where he's from
[00:31.48]One of the good ones
[00:36.39]He's one of the good ones
[00:41.56]Love me like he should one
[00:44.14]Like he wrote the book one
[00:47.72]The kind you find when you don't even look one
[00:51.83]Anybody can be good once
[00:55.72]But he's good all the time
[00:58.48]He's one of the good ones
[01:02.59]And he's all mine
[01:09.18]He's one of the good ones
[01:14.47]You'll know him when you see him
[01:16.81]By the way he looks at me
[01:19.64]You'd say he hung the moon
[01:21.83]I'd say he hung the galaxy
[01:25.06]Nobody does it better
[01:27.42]Oh the way he pulls me in
[01:30.46]I've known a couple bad ones
[01:32.84]But they all led me to him
[01:35.23]He's one of the good ones
[01:40.05]Love me like he should one
[01:42.81]Like he wrote the book one
[01:46.41]The kind you find when you don't even look one
[01:50.45]Anybody can be good once
[01:54.31]But he's good all the time
[01:56.91]He's one of the good ones
[02:01.15]And he's all mine
[02:07.71]He's one of the good ones
[02:23.05]We should all find us one
[02:28.46]They're out there
[02:31.05]Minus one
[02:33.81]Some of the good ones
[02:39.17]Yeah I got a good one
[02:44.13]Love me like he should one
[02:46.73]Like he wrote the book one
[02:50.42]The kind you find when you don't even look
[02:54.37]Anybody can be good once
[02:57.90]But he's good all the time
[03:00.95]He's one of the good ones
[03:05.16]And he's all mine
[03:12.00]He's one of the good ones
[03:16.31]He's all mine
data.trans:
[ti:The Good Ones]
[ar:Gabby Barrett]
[al:The Good Ones]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.07]//
[00:10.15]他是给父母的一通电话问候
[00:12.82]他是床头的一本圣经
[00:15.51]他是我身上穿的T恤
[00:18.17]他是我脑中回荡的歌
[00:20.82]他忠实又可靠
[00:23.44]就像绵延的阿勒格尼河
[00:26.52]他清楚自己的方向
[00:28.81]他为自己的出身自豪
[00:31.48]传说中那种好男人
[00:36.39]他是传说中的那种好男人
[00:41.56]把爱我当作理所当然的事
[00:44.14]仿佛他只是写了一本
[00:47.72]你看都不会看一眼的书
[00:51.83]每个人都有善解人意的时候
[00:55.72]但他的好从头到尾 从未改变
[00:58.48]他是传说中的那种好男人
[01:02.59]他只属于我一个人
[01:09.18]他是传说中的那种好男人
[01:14.47]等你见到他 你就会了解
[01:16.81]通过他看我的眼神
[01:19.64]你会忍不住称赞他是绝世好男人
[01:21.83]我会说他是冠绝古今的良人
[01:25.06]没有人可以比他更温柔
[01:27.42]当他轻轻把我拥入怀中
[01:30.46]我交往过几个渣男
[01:32.84]但他们都只是把我推到了他身边
[01:35.23]他是传说中的那种好男人
[01:40.05]把爱我当作理所当然的事
[01:42.81]仿佛他只是写了一本
[01:46.41]你看都不会看一眼的书
[01:50.45]每个人都有善解人意的时候
[01:54.31]但他的好从头到尾 从未改变
[01:56.91]他是传说中的那种好男人
[02:01.15]他只属于我一个人
[02:07.71]他是传说中的那种好男人
[02:23.05]我们都该给自己找个良配
[02:28.46]他们就在未来等着
[02:31.05]得先减去一个
[02:33.81]那些传说中的好男人
[02:39.17]有一个在我这里
[02:44.13]把爱我当作理所当然的事
[02:46.73]仿佛他只是写了一本
[02:50.42]你看都不会看一眼的书
[02:54.37]每个人都有善解人意的时候
[02:57.90]但他的好从头到尾 从未改变
[03:00.95]他是传说中的那种好男人
[03:05.16]他只属于我一个人
[03:12.00]他是传说中的那种好男人
[03:16.31]他只属于我一个人
